# Contact

### Meet the Team

-   Dr. Durrell D. Kapan: Senior Research Fellow, California Academy of Sciences. Concept, MAX-SUM algorithm, protocol testing as area leader on two CBC counts.

-   Mark Schulist: eBirdCBC primary developer, programming, website design, and protocol deployment during live CBCs.

-   This project also relies on the efforts of countless volunteers on CBCs who put up with being test subjects.

-   We dedicate this work to all the bird enthusiasts who have contributed to the success of CBCs for over 123 years!
